definition: to ramble/to rove/old variant of 熬[ao2]
lower form of animal life, including insects, insect larvae, worms and similar creatures/CL:條|条[tiao2],隻|只[zhi1]/(fig.) person with a particular undesirable characteristic

sentences.english: The larva takes aim at the snail's tentacles. It strikes with its poison nippers.
sentences.chinese: 小萤火虫瞄准了蜗牛的触角，并用自己带毒的螯出击。

sentences.english: Lobsters are able to reproduce claws when they are torn off.
sentences.chinese: 龙虾的螯被扯去后还能再生出来。

sentences.english: Tremor disease (TD) is the most serious epizootic of the crab in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 而颤抖病是近年来中华绒螯蟹最严重的流行病。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, resection of Eyestalk can also promote pre- spawning.
sentences.chinese: 同时，切除眼柄，也能促进克氏原螯虾提早产卵。

sentences.english: Fig . 9 Myocardium cell of Procambarus clark ii . Showing striation of myofibril.
sentences.chinese: 图9螯虾心肌细胞示肌原纤维的横纹。

sentences.english: New Zealand deep sea Scampi consommé, truffle and scallop ravioli, tomato.
sentences.chinese: 新西兰深海螯虾清汤，黑菌和扇贝饺子，番茄。

sentences.english: The content of kalium was more than sodium.
sentences.chinese: 中华绒螯蟹钾的含量明显高于钠。

sentences.english: The present paper describes a new species of the genus Anteon Jurine.
sentences.chinese: 本文报道了采自浙江省西天目山的单爪螯蜂属一新种。

sentences.english: First its claws is copped like a pistol, then fired.
sentences.chinese: 首先它的螯像手枪一样“上膛“，然后开火。

sentences.english: Look at its nippers, so scary and ugly.
sentences.chinese: 你们看它的螯，多么吓人多么丑陋。

sentences.english: The results showed that the digestive system is composed of fore-gut, mid-gut, hind-gut and digestive gland.
sentences.chinese: 结果表明，克氏螯虾消化系统包括消化道和消化腺。

sentences.english: New Zealand deep sea Scampi consommé, truffle and scallop ravioli , tomato.
sentences.chinese: 新西兰深海螯虾清汤，黑菌和扇贝饺子，番茄。

sentences.english: A systematic study on the effect of chelate ring size on the stability of thechelate is reported.
sentences.chinese: 本文系统地研究了螯环大小对螯合物稳定性的影响。

sentences.english: Xuyi lobster is freshwater lobster, also known as Crayfish.
sentences.chinese: 盱眙龙虾是淡水龙虾，又称克氏螯虾。

sentences.english: The subfamily Bocchinae is firstly recorded from China.
sentences.chinese: 栉爪螯蜂亚科为中国首次记录。

sentences.english: She cracked a lobster's claw and hooked out some of the flesh.
sentences.chinese: 她将龙虾的螯敲开，勾出一些虾肉来。

definition: ambulatory leg (of a crab, lobster, spider etc)
pincers/pliers/tongs/claw (of animal)/to grasp with pincers/to pinch/to clamp/to restrain/to restrict/to gag
